reviewText: My husband finds them a bit annoying, The videos remind me a bit of blues clues. But KIDS LIKE them. The program teaches it a lot about music and piano playing. Great for preschoolers. IF YOU ONLY USE IT FOR ONE CHILD YOU MIGHT BE ABLE TO USE THIS CHEAPER BY GETTING AN ONLINE MEMBERSHIP THROUGHT THE KINDERBACH WEBSITE. I LIKE HAVING THE DVDS, BUT IF YOU DON't mind ONLINE videos that might be the way to go. Plus you'll want levels 1-3 first.
